mapper.insert: insert into t_goods(name, price, remark, createTime) values(#{name}, #{price}, #{remark}, now())
mapper.update: update t_goods set name=#{name}, price= #{price}, remark=#{remark}, createTime=now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_goods where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: select id, name, price, remark, date_format(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as createTime from t_goods where id = #{id}
update t_gold_detail set flag = '1', confirmTime = now() where id = #{id}
